attributes.action: Prevent religious laws ever having any legal status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government should introduce  legislation to prevent religious laws such as Sharia Law having any legal status.

Ensure that all UK citizens have to live by the same laws and no-one has any special status above the law or has a different set of laws applied to them.

rejection.details: The Government does not pass laws preventing it from passing future laws. The situation you request, namely that "all UK citizens have to live by the same laws and no-one has any special status above the law or has a different set of laws applied to them", already exists.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
